H1.text: when does the new death of superman come out. 2015

H2.text: when does the new death of superman come out. 2022

H3.text: when does the new death of superman come out. 2018

A4.text: The only death of Superman mentioned in the text occurs in Superman #75, published in January 1993.

A5.text: An edition of The Death of Superman containing the DVD/Blu-ray versions of the 2007 film adaptation, Superman: Doomsday, was released in 2015.

A6.text: To coincide with the release of the animated film adaptation of the crossover in 2018, a 12-part Death of Superman webcomic series began, written by Simonson and illustrated by Cat Staggs, Joel Ojeda, and Laura Braga, among others.
